welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Kernersville, a charming city known for its historic landmarks and friendly community. Get ready to explore and experience all that our town has to offer. We hope you enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Smith-Reynolds Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Smith-Reynolds Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Piedmont Triad International Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Piedmont Triad International Airport handles all cargo and freight shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
